arts.ttl: Man Utd receive Rasmus Hojlund injury update after Erik ten Hag's warning to Denmark
arts.sum: Manchester United have been hoping they'll get Rasmus Hojlund back in a fit state after his time with Denmark as Erik ten Hag insists the player cannot be thrown in after an injury lay off

arts.ttl: Lamine Yamal equalled a surprise international record in Spain’s win over Denmark
arts.sum: Barcelona starlet Lamine Yamal secured for himself a head-turning piece of personal history, in his latest outing on the international stage. Wide-man Lamine was for his part back in action…

arts.ttl: Former Brentford coach and Anderlecht head coach in the picture to take over Denmark’s national team
arts.sum: Bold are reporting that Brian Riemer is in talks to become the next head coach of the Danish national team. The former Anderlecht head coach, who was sacked last month,…

arts.ttl: ‘Not afraid of you’ – Denmark star admits to tough treatment of Barcelona’s Lamine Yamal
arts.sum: Denmark and Leicester City star Victor Kristiansen has on Sunday all but admitted that he and his teammates targeted Spanish starlet Lamine Yamal last night. Spain of course put Denmark…
